GameObject
Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.GameObject
      GameObject.StaticObject
          GameObject.Bomb

public class Bomb
extends StaticObject

This class creates an object used to represent the bombs placed by the player during gameplay. It includes the logic relevant to triggering an explosion, and the timing of that same event.

Method Detail

timeExplosion

public void timeExplosion()

explode

public void explode()
Toggle the visibility of the object to false. The bomb will be deleted in the next refresh of the screen.

isFirstCollision

public boolean isFirstCollision()
determine whether the player is colliding with the bomb for the first time or not.

Returns:
A boolean representing whether this is the first time the player is colliding with the the Bomb

setFirstCollision

public void setFirstCollision(boolean firstCollision)
Set the first collision attribute of the bomb object.

Parameters:
firstCollision - boolean representing whether the player object has collided with this bomb instance in the past.
